author: Giovanni Burdi
description: Long and refreshing whilst also packing a full shot of absinthe - perhaps the best spirit to hold its own when drowned with fiery ginger beer, a combo used to good effect in this mule with lime juice.
name: Bohemian Mule
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir
